en: Can't you quit it?
Could you please turn off the radio for me?
zh: 能帮我把收音机关了吗？

en: You can't make a mixture of oil and water.
zh: 油和水是没法混合在一起的。

en: It is not easy to skillfully carry out easy tasks.
zh: 想把简单的事情做好也不容易。

en: Tom couldn't tell Mary how he really felt.
zh: 汤姆没法告诉玛丽他的真实感受。

en: Originality is taking something that already known and combining in a extraordinary way.
zh: 创意就是把已知的东西以非凡的方式结合起来。

en: If the people cannot use elections to drag a dictator down from power, they'll have no choice but to obey him.
zh: 如果民众不能通过选举让独裁者下台，就只能服从他。

en: Memorizing the order of a deck of playing cards is definitely not easy, but it's not impossible.
zh: 记住一副扑克牌的顺序肯定不容易，但也不是不可能。

en: Please wait while I get a towel.
zh: 请等一下，我去拿条毛巾。

en: Please wait. I'll bring you a towel.
zh: 请稍等，我这就给你拿条毛巾来。

en: May I go buy some ice cream?
zh: 我可以去买点冰激凌吗？

en: Can I go buy some ice cream?
Do you get the feeling that you're causing trouble for those around you?
zh: 你有没有觉得自己给周围的人添麻烦了？

en: Do you feel self-conscious about being a nuisance to those around you?
zh: 你有没有意识到你打扰到周围的人了？

en: Are you aware that you're being a nuisance?
zh: 你知不知道你这样很烦人？

en: There haven't been many movies like this recently.
zh: 最近没怎么出过这种电影。

en: "It's been a while since we had a serious conversation, eh." "That's for sure. We usually only have idiotic conversations."
zh: “咱们好久没正经聊过天了，是吧。”“确实，平时咱们聊的尽是些废话。”

en: Well, what shall we do for fun today...
zh: 哎，咱们今天玩点什么好呢……

en: They aren't just any 3-D glasses.
zh: 这些可不是普通的3D眼镜。

en: These aren't just any 3-D glasses.
zh: 这些可不是一般的3D眼镜。

en: It's cold outside, so he came inside the room.
"Je t'aime" means "I love you" in French.
zh: 法语里的“Je t'aime”是“我爱你”的意思。

en: I'm so tired I could die.
Can I have your full name?
Is it ok if you wait just a little while?
Has anything been unclear so far?
zh: 到现在为止有什么不清楚的地方吗？

en: It looks like that, huh?
Well, this is the street!
I'll go if it's fun.
At this point, there's nowhere left to go!
zh: 都这会儿了，已经没地方可去了！

en: He's a thief, isn't he?
You're a thief, aren't you?
You're thieves, aren't you?
She's a thief, isn't she?
They are thieves, aren't they?
There is definetly a safe route!

en: I thought it was something like this. I tried to come because I was worried.
zh: 我就知道是这样。我因为担心才赶过来的。

en: Who are you calling stupid?!
Ow! Stop it!
The wind sure is cold.
The bus now arriving is going to Domestic Terminal 1. Passengers for the International Terminal, please wait. The shuttle bus to the International Terminal also leaves from this stop.
zh: 即将到站的巴士开往1号国内航站楼。去往国际航站楼的旅客请稍候。去往国际航站楼的摆渡车也从本站发车。

en: The bus now arriving is going to the International Terminal via Domestic Terminal 1.
zh: 即将到站的巴士经由1号国内航站楼开往国际航站楼。

en: We are bound for Domestic terminal 1. We will not be making any stops at the International terminal, so please take care.
zh: 本车开往1号国内航站楼。本车不在国际航站楼停靠，请大家注意。

en: I guess I'll just do some homework by my lonely self or something...
zh: 我估计也就只能自己孤零零地写作业什么的了吧……

en: Tom left through the back door.
You shouldn't be so prideful.
You should suppress your pride.
zh: 你应该收敛一下你的傲气。

en: Why does she hate you so much?
zh: 她为什么这么讨厌你啊？

en: You can save your life and your family lives by always preparing for earthquakes.
zh: 随时做好地震预警，能救你和你家人的命。

en: What are you piddle-farting around for? I could do that in 10 minutes.
zh: 你在那瞎磨蹭什么呢？我十分钟就能弄好。

en: "Do you know what floppy disks are?" "Of course I do!" "Have you ever used one?" "Nah, I haven't."
zh: “你知道什么是软盘吗？”“当然知道！”“你用过吗？”“没，我没用过。”

en: The eruption of the volcano Vesuvius destroyed the city of Pompeii.
zh: 维苏威火山爆发摧毁了庞贝古城。

en: Love alone is not enough for a successful international marriage.
zh: 一段成功的跨国婚姻，光靠爱情是不够的。

en: Love alone isn't enough for a successful international marriage.
zh: 跨国婚姻，光有爱可是不够的。

en: We planted rice.
We stayed at a farm house.
zh: 我们住在了一户农家里。

en: We helped on the farm.
We went to a firework festival.
"Can I ask you for a bit of a favor?" "It depends on what the favor is."
zh: “能请你帮个忙吗？”“那得看是什么事。”

en: Please sit as close to the front as possible.
Did you read this morning's newspaper?
zh: 你看今天早上的报纸了吗？

en: Could you please briefly introduce yourself?
zh: 能请你简单介绍一下自己吗？

en: First of all, please do a simple self-introduction.
zh: 首先，请做一个简单的自我介绍。

en: That isn't wine. It's grape juice.
So thin! Are you dieting?
Wow! You've lost weight. Are you on a diet?
Obviously not!
That sounds like fun, doesn't it?
zh: 听起来挺有意思的，对吧？

en: Oh no! It looks like someone is crying.
It'd be nice if tomorrow never came.
zh: 要是明天永远不来就好了。

en: You don't have to worry about something like that.
If there's some way to enjoy studying, could you teach me how?
zh: 如果有什么能让学习变得有趣的方法，你能教教我吗？

en: Is it OK if I drink all of this?
Did you plan to eat all of that yourself?
zh: 你打算一个人把那些全吃了吗？

en: Do you plan to eat all of that yourself?
zh: 你打算一个人把那些全吃了吗？

en: Are you going to eat all of that yourself?
zh: 这么多你打算一个人全吃光？

en: Are you planning on eating that all by yourself?
zh: 你该不会是想一个人把那些全吃了吧？

en: What kind of movies have you seen lately?
zh: 你最近都看了些什么类型的电影？

en: What movies have you seen recently?
zh: 你最近都看了些什么电影？

en: Is there anyone who can't come tomorrow?
Today's a bit warmer than usual, wouldn't ya say?
zh: 今天比平时暖和点，你说呢？

en: Today's a bit warmer than usual, isn't it?
zh: 今天比平时暖和点，对吧？

en: Today's a bit warmer than usual.
It looks like there's an elevator over there.
It's best not to get involved in this problem.
He has bad eyesight.
She drank the expired milk.
I really like TV.
I'm a kid who watches a lot of TV.
zh: 我是个爱看电视的小孩。

en: I think that girl was pretty when she was younger.
zh: 我觉得那女孩小时候挺漂亮的。

en: Every year without fail, lots of foreigners come to Japan.
zh: 每年必定会有很多外国人来日本。

en: That's her car.
Stop the car!
I was proud of my son.
zh: 我曾为我儿子感到骄傲。

en: This picture has very low resolution, the quality is very low.
zh: 这张照片分辨率太低了，画质很差。

en: Tom ran home.
A heavy frost is expected tonight.
My father was happy with the result.
zh: 我父亲对那个结果很满意。

en: Hold up, I'm only a film extra?
What do you mean by "sometimes"?
zh: 你说的“有时候”是什么意思？

en: I study sometimes!
zh: 我偶尔也会学习的好吧！

en: Ugh, I have to study for tomorrow's test.
zh: 唉，我得为了明天的考试复习了。

en: It is getting bigger.
I'm just popping out to the #2 factory.
zh: 我去二号厂那边转一圈。

en: Damn, Jackson! You really have a learning disability!
zh: 靠，杰克逊！你还真有学习障碍啊！

en: Why are you able to explain things so well?
zh: 你怎么能讲得这么明白？

en: Why are you so good at explaining things?
I'm not rich enough.
I've also become fond of you.
Everything was new to me.
zh: 对我来说一切都很新鲜。

en: How can I turn off this light?
I wish I had brought my computer.
I want to be able to make something like this too.
zh: 我也想能做出这种东西。

en: If you try that again, I won't tolerate it.
zh: 你要是再敢试一次，我绝不姑息。

en: I won't forgive you if you do it again.
zh: 你要是再敢这么干，我绝不原谅你。

en: You really are the chaff of humanity.
Are okay after yesterday's earthquake?
Please contact me if you have any questions.
I accept you.
I like studying languages from ancient times.
You've already had breakfast, haven't you?
They held each other tight.
They hugged each other.
This sofa is not nice.
We are sleepy.
OK, let's begin!
My mother is a very strange person.
My mother is eccentric.
Tom, how are things?
Tom, how is the current situation?
We really don't have time.
She has a slender waist.
I am thankful.
What is the name of the restaurant?
What's that restaurant's name?
What's the name of that restaurant?
Tom seems to be crying.
Tom arrived this morning.
I still really like it.
Tom stopped using Facebook.
I want tomorrow to be fine.
My only friends are love and courage.
zh: 我唯一的朋友就是爱和勇气。

en: No one had to wait.
I know that it's difficult.
What are you wearing to graduation?
Tom's somewhere in the park.
zh: 汤姆在公园的某个地方。

en: Entry is free on Sundays.
Tom is different from other boys.
zh: 汤姆跟别的男孩子不一样。

en: I'd like to ask Tom what his thoughts are.
zh: 我想问问汤姆是怎么想的。

en: I wonder why Tom went and did something like that.
zh: 我在想汤姆为什么要做出那种事。

en: We'll stop here for today.
What is it that you're afraid of?
Doesn't that look fun?
Why are you stopping now?
Don't tell Tom what really happened.
zh: 别告诉汤姆到底发生了什么。

en: Tom is my ideal man.
What's scary?
I told Tom that he had to take his studies more seriously.
zh: 我告诉过汤姆，学习得再认真点儿。

en: Tom was praising you, you know.
I don't like people like Tom.
zh: 我不喜欢像汤姆那样的人。

en: Tom just announced he'd be moving to Boston.
zh: 汤姆刚宣布他要搬到波士顿。

en: Last night, me and Tom dreamt the same dream.
zh: 昨晚我和汤姆做了同一个梦。

en: There's no such thing as a perfect human being.
zh: 这世界上没有完美的人。

en: Fly!
He didn't know to do.
You can start right now.
Tom is a martial artist.
Tom practices martial arts.
Tom is funnier than Mary.
Tom is more interesting than Mary.
That light is green.
I am lost for words when you tell me that you love me.
zh: 当你告诉我你爱我的时候，我都不知该说什么了。

en: It looks like there's no reception in this room.
Cry your heart out.
zh: 想哭就痛痛快快哭一场吧。

en: Everyone was carrying a log?
zh: 每个人都搬着一根木头？

en: Fraction b/a means 1/a is double number of b.
zh: 分数 b/a 的意思就是 b 个 1/a。

en: a⨯b can be abbreviated as ab.
I have not yet downloaded the file.
zh: 我还没下载那个文件呢。

en: I haven't downloaded the file yet.
The rain beats against the window pane.
I want freedom.
That's not true either.
That's not their fault.
That's not a solution.
That's not a big problem.
That's a good response.
A character that represents an number which is operated to a result is called an equation.
zh: 表示运算结果相等的式子叫等式。

en: As per commutative law, I understand that it is -(-x) = x, 1/(1/x) = x .
zh: 根据交换律，我理解它是 -(-x) = x, 1/(1/x) = x。

en: The highest amount of points possible on reports is 10 points.
zh: 报告最高可以得 10 分。

en: The report topic will be announced at the appropriate time.
zh: 报告的主题会在合适的时候公布。

en: In contemporary times, the frequency use of cellphones as telephones is extremely low.
zh: 现如今，大家已经很少用手机打电话了。

en: It's not very durable.
Your name? I'm Paulo.
Tom made a phone call.
That bread is in the oven.
Your homework for each class will be to review the day's lesson and to prepare for the next one.
zh: 每节课的作业都是复习当天学的内容并预习下一课。

en: A set should be expressed as a list of elements like {1, 2, 3}.
zh: 集合应该表示成元素列表的形式，比如 {1, 2, 3}。

en: Tom is an affluent man.
Tom didn't agree with Marie.
zh: 汤姆不同意玛丽的意见。

en: Please, don't protest.
One-third is less than one-half.
zh: 三分之一小于二分之一。

en: Who is essential for that?
I asked him for his name.
Where is my mother?
I can't not work again.
He can't do without you.
Chris will come here.
Marie bought several breads.
I have that at home.
For f(x)=2x+1, when the domain of the function is [1,2], the range is [3,5].
zh: 对于 f(x)=2x+1，当定义域是 [1,2] 时，值域是 [3,5]。

en: Who is going to the store?
Perhaps he's even waiting at the station right now.
zh: 说不定他现在就在车站等着呢。

en: Aren't you asleep yet?
Steve is an American name.
I don't look like I'm elderly.
"Karin" is a German name.
Is that cat grey?
I will stop you.
What is it that separates this from the sea?
zh: 是什么把这里和大海隔开了？

en: Who chose you?
I felt a sense of isolation.
But you don't know. Nobody can comprehend what it feels like to be old.
zh: 但你不知道。没人能理解变老是什么滋味。

en: I washed my feet.
I did see it.
I wanted to save you.
I wanted to rescue you.
That dog's name is Ken.
I have no idea what I'm going to do now.
zh: 我现在完全不知道该怎么办。

en: This was harder than I thought it would be.
This was more difficult than I thought it would be.
This is reasonable.
He begged for her to come home.
A doctor is necessary.
It was a deep darkness.
Who said this to you?
It's extremely important to explain the danger.
That bread has started to go stale.
I want to go to Japan someday.
Making friends is simple for guys.
zh: 对男生来说，交朋友很简单。

en: Who cares about bad manners?
Don't eat!
I don't think that you're crazy.
My favorite fish is salmon.
zh: 我最喜欢的鱼是三文鱼。

en: I took the most important events from the chronology of information science and wrote a few words about each one.
zh: 我从信息科学年表里挑了些最重要的事件，给每一个都写了几句话。

en: Computers as we know them today first appeared before the Second World War.
zh: 我们现在所熟知的计算机最初在二战前就出现了。

en: How are you learning Esperanto?
I always hated this place.
zh: 我一直很讨厌这个地方。

en: I wanted to know what had happened.
I can see that book.
Please come to class having reviewed the materials beforehand.
zh: 请预习好材料后再来上课。

en: Following this class's instruction, you will develop a comprehensive perceptive of Japanese.
zh: 通过这门课的学习，你会对日语有一个全面的了解。

en: Tom's wife's a friend of mine.
zh: 汤姆的妻子是我的一个朋友。

en: I'm on my way to work now.
You must be kidding me!
Japan's climate is calm.
Tom never hurt Mary.
zh: 汤姆从来没有伤害过玛丽。

en: Tom speaks several languages.
Tom heard some shots.
When I was at high school the subjects I liked were geography and history.
zh: 我上高中的时候，喜欢的科目是地理和历史。

en: I don't care for the consequences.
You aren't very smart.
You're scary!
Do you want to become famous?
That's especially true right now.
That's a very difficult question.
That's a pretty strong statement.

We're stocking up on everything.
We're pretty proud of ourselves.
We're not afraid of competition.
